task.title: Calculating areas of closed objects
task.shortdesc: You can find the area of any closed object. In addition, the programcalculates either the circumference or the perimeter of the object, depending on the type of object you select.

context.p: To calculate the area of a closed object

step.cmd: Choose Tools > Inquiry > Area from the main menu.
On the command line, type o (object).
